name: The Blueprint Dashboard - Notion Template
description: A simple and effective way to focus on the things that matter.Effortlessly stay organised and on top of your schedule with 'The Blueprint' - your all-in-one solution to daily, weekly, and monthly planning.Features:Daily planner template that highlights daily focus, tasks, and notesAutomatic updates for schedule, next steps, and due datesWeekly planner for prioritising tasks and viewing weekly schedule and due tasksMonthly planner for setting goals and reviewing progressCustomisable sections for
features: Daily plannertemplate that highlights daily focus, tasks, and notes; Automatic updatesfor schedule, next steps, and due dates; Weekly plannerfor prioritising tasks and viewing weekly schedule and due tasks; Monthly plannerfor setting goals and reviewing progress; Customisable sectionsfor setting and achieving your goals; User-friendlyand easy to use interface; Notion is an all-in-one workspace to store docs, databases, manage projects, company wikis and so much more.; If you don't have an account, don't worry. Sign up for one below, it's free!; Click"Duplicate"on the top right corner to duplicate it to your personal workspace.; If you're on mobile click on the3 dotsmenu at the top right to show the duplicate option.
